data.actual_result: "Change" text is in your previous language and doesn't change until you refresh
data.expected_result: Language change properly applies to the "Change" text upon changing
data.short_description: After changing your client language, the "Change" text in the Create a Server modal doesn't change to the now applied language
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your language to something (e.g. French/Spanish) - Go into the modal at the end of your server list - Enter Create a Server and observe the Change button's text
